title: How can I contact customer support
content: I got a new pixel 4 in January the phone has broken twice already nobody a Google can help nobody responds nobody answers I had to pay 250 just to get a phone to use for work because Google wouldn't help now I had to file an insurance claim for my daughter's phone and google sent me a blocked phone that can't be turned on nobody at Google answers or response this is the worst customer support I suggest Nobody by a Google pixel or any other Google products they have the worst customer service
